TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but the picture will disintegrate once you\'ve get it.

I wish for the real meaning of life.

Granted, it is 42.

I wish I knew the ultimate question.

Granted, it was 'will it blend?'

I wish for a bucket of antimatter.

Granted, but the bucket of antimatter is filled with matter.

I wish for a bucket full of quasars.

Granted, but it was lost in delivery. An \'accident\' that took quite some time to arrange.

I wish to ask the first question, the oldest question in the universe that must never be answered, hidden in plain sight to a certain doctor on the fields of trenzalore at the fall of the eleventh soon.

Granted, but the question you\'re looking is incomprehensible.

I wish for a basketball-sized fragment of a neutron star.

Granted, but it cooks you alive.

I wish for a wish.

Granted, but you just used it up.

I wish to know where Waldo is hiding.

Granted, you just don\'t know who Waldo is anymore

I wish for a stable VTOL

Granted, but it\'s made by the Kerbals.

I wish for a star.

Granted, but it\'s where we\'ll shoot the RP files into to destroy them - and we all know how much you hated RP.

I wish to see Flixx\'s reaction.

Granted, but his expression is stuck on your face permanently.

I wish for the RP forums to come back.
Granted, but I launch my Biological WMDs at you and build another 100MT H-Bomb and use it on Kerbin.
I wish for this thread to come alive again

Granted, but it soon pisses you off so much that you are driven to murder it.

I wish for this wish to not have any corruption attached to it whatsoever.

Granted, But it farts peanut butter.

I wish for a pony!

Granted, but you have to feed it off your skin.

I wish not to see that.

Granted, you don\'t see it live. However, you are strapped down and forced to watch a recording.

I wish for more wishes, despite it violating genie rules.

You are granted an infinite number of extra wishes, however you can no longer wish for anything except the freeing of genies.

I wish for a cool new pair of shoes.

Granted, but a massive flying cow hits it with a solid rocket booster.

I wish for a tamed massive flying cow that craps out Jebidiah Kermans.

Granted, but the Jebs all crap cows and eventually the whole universe is made up of infinitely, exponentially replicating shitcows and shitjebs.

I wish for the power to do anything at all, including uncorrupting this wish.

Granted, but then you get a 404 error, as you try to divide by zero and find that it is really an instantkill.

I wish for nothing.

Granted. Everything you have every loved has turned into nothing.

I wish for everything.

Granted, you get everything starting with deadly diseases

I wish for moar boosters

Granted. They are all empty.

I wish for wealth.
